events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle on 2024-04-30, requesting to file a claim for damages.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial customer description and keywords indicating a vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the case promptly due to the severity of the car collision reported.
The insurer officially acknowledged receipt of the claim, confirming all initial details submitted by the customer.
The claims agent requested police reports, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report, photos, and repair estimates within the specified timeframe.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence to verify the details and assess liability related to the vehicle accident.
Investigation concluded confirming the claimant was not at fault and the reported damages align with customer statements.
A settlement amount was proposed based on the repair estimates and investigation findings, aiming to cover all relevant damages.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and confirmed satisfaction with the communication throughout the claim process.
The claim was approved by the claims supervisor after final review of all documents and customer feedback.
Payment for the approved settlement was processed and transferred to the customer's bank account successfully.
The claim was formally closed after confirming payment receipt and final customer agreement on the resolution.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived for future reference, completing the administrative closure of the case.
